Literature.Title: M10709, A NEW CYCLIC PEPTIDE ANTIBIOTIC FROM CLINICALLY ISOLATED STREPTOMYCES SP.
Literature.Author: Kumamoto T, Koshino H, Watanabe D, Matsumoto Y, Aoyama K, Harada K, Nishikawa T, Mikami Y

Sequence Information.Target Organism: Micrococcus luteus IFM 2066(MIC=5µg/ml),Staphylococcus aureus 209P(MIC=>80µg/ml),Bacillus subtilis PCI 219(MIC=>80µg/ml),Escherichia coli NIHJ JC-2(MIC=>80µg/ml),Candida albicans ATCC 90029(MIC=>80µg/ml),Aspergillus niger IFM 5368(MIC=>80µg/ml),Trichophyton mentagrophytes IFM 40092(MIC=>80µg/ml)
